comment: Specialization: if a formula is true for all sets, it is true for any class which is a set. Similar to Theorem 6.11 of [Quine] p. 44. See also ~ stdpc4 and ~ rspsbc . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2017.)
